Event.name: Manufacturing
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Producer</fen> produces a <fen>Product</fen> from a <fen>Resource</fen> for commercial purposes. <ex> They <t>produced</t> <fex name="Product">only half of the units</fex> <fex name="Circumstances">after an injunction to follow the environmental policy</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Producer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person or company that produces the Product. <ex><fex name="Producer">General Electric</fex> <t>manufactures</t> <fex name="Product">electronic appliances</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Product
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Product</fen> is produced by the <fen>Producer</fen>. <ex><fex name="Producer">The company</fex> <t>manufactured</t> <fex name="Product">T-shirts</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Resource
Arg.definition: <def-root>Resource is the material that the product is made from. <ex><fex name="Product">Copal varnishes</fex> are <t>manufactured</t> <fex name="Resource">from fossilised resins</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Product</fen> is manufactured. <ex><fex name="Product">Those leather shoes</fex> were <t>made</t> <fex name="Place">in Italy</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This Fe identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the product was produced. <ex><fex name="Product">Those cars</fex> were <t>produced</t> <fex name="Time">in 1997</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Factory
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Factory</fen> identifies the particular plant where the <fen>Product</fen> is manufactured. <ex><fex name="Product">Those machines</fex> were <t>manufactured</t> <fex name="Factory">in the Miami plant</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Consumer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Producer</fen> produces the <fen>Product</fen> for the <fen>Consumer</fen>. <ex><fex name="Product">The toys</fex> are <t>made</t> <fex name="Consumer">for children</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>A phrase that describes the state of the <fen>Producer</fen> or the <fen>Product</fen> during the manufacturing process. <ex>They <t>manufactured</t> the goods <fex name="Depictive">naked</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Instrument</fen> with which a <fen>Producer</fen> produces a <fen>Product</fen>. <ex><fex name="Product">Those lamps</fex> were <t>made</t> <fex name="Instrument">by machines</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Manner</fen> in which a <fen>Producer</fen> creates a <fen>Product</fen>. <ex><fex name="Product">Fine furniture</fex> is usually <t>made</t> <fex name="Manner">slowly</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Means</fen> by which a <fen>Producer</fen> creates a <fen>Product</fen>. <ex><fex name="Product">Cars</fex> are <t>manufactured</t> <fex name="Means">by mass production</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which an <fen>Producer</fen> produces a <fen>Product</fen>. <ex><fex name="Producer">The company</fex> will <t>produce</t> more <fex name="Depictive">high-tech</fex> <fex name="Product"> gadgets</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to meet the demand of the market</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the the product was produced. <ex><fex name="Manufacturer">They</fex> <t>produced</t> <fex name="Product">only half of the units</fex> <fex name="Circumstances">after an injunction to follow the environmental policy</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The number of manufacturing events in a given time period.
<ex>We <t>produce</t> 90 million units <fex name="fre">every month</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Locus
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Locus</fen> is a description of the active zone of the <fen>Producer</fen>, where the manufacturing most saliently takes place. </def-root>

lexUnit.name: manufacture.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make (something) on a large scale using machinery.

lexUnit.name: make.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: form by putting parts together or combining substances.

lexUnit.name: manufacturing.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the process of producing products

lexUnit.name: manufacturer.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the company or person that makes (something) on a large scale using machinery

lexUnit.name: production.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the action or process of producing or being produced.

lexUnit.name: producer.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a company or person that produces something on a mass scale

lexUnit.name: industrial.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: related to economic activity concerned with the processing of raw materials and manufacture of goods in factories.

lexUnit.name: fabricate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: construct or manufacture (an industrial product), especially from prepared components

lexUnit.name: fabrication.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: construction or manufacturing of an industrial product, especially from prepared components

lexUnit.name: product.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the finished item that is sold or exchanged.

lexUnit.name: assembly line.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: may either refer to the physical location where products are manufactured or the process by which those products are made.
